title: Home
welcomeText:
# Yo, CiiBER.co is all yo need for yo business.

OK, not exactly *all* you need, but we're definitely *what* you need. Why? Because CiiBER.co is the leading Business Solutions and Workflow Management company in greater NY. Our favorite words are: "What can we do for you?" So what *can*  we do for you, you ask? Shoot us an email and let's get right to it. And while your at it, why not include some of the most pressing IT and tech issues your company is facing.
seoDescription: A quickstart for Nuxt & Netlify CMS
